00002  * @file ccnsyncwatch.c

00020 #include <fcntl.h>
00021 #include <stdio.h>
00022 #include <stdlib.h>
00023 #include <string.h>
00024 #include <ctype.h>
00025 #include <unistd.h>
00026 
00027 #include <ccn/ccn.h>
00028 #include <ccn/sync.h>
00029 #include <ccn/uri.h>

00031 
00032 char *
00033 hex_string(unsigned char *s, size_t l)
00034 {
00035     const char *hex_digits = "0123456789abcdef";
00036     char *r;
00037     int i;
00038     r = calloc(1, 1 + 2 * l);
00039     for (i = 0; i < l; i++) {
00040         r[2*i] = hex_digits[(s[i]>>4) & 0xf];
00041         r[1+2*i] = hex_digits[s[i] & 0xf];
00042     }
00043     return(r);
00044 }
00045 
00046 int hex_value(char c)
00047 {
00048     if (0 == isxdigit(c)) return (-1);
00049     if (c >= '0' && c <= '9') return (c - '0');
00050     return (10+tolower(c) - 'a');
00051 }
00052 
00053 void
00054 usage(char *prog)
00055 {
00056     fprintf(stderr,
00057             "%s [-h] [-t topo-uri] [-p prefix-uri] [-f filter-uri] [-r roothash-hex] [-w timeout-secs]\n"
00058             "   topo-uri, prefix-uri, and filter-uri must be CCNx URIs.\n"
00059             "   roothash-hex must be an even number of hex digits "
00060             "representing a valid starting root hash.\n"
00061             "   timeout-secs is the time, in seconds that the program "
00062             "should monitor sync activity.\n"
00063             "       or -1 to run until interrupted.\n", prog);
00064     exit(1);
00065 }
00066 
00067 int
00068 sync_cb(struct ccns_name_closure *nc,
00069         struct ccn_charbuf *lhash,
00070         struct ccn_charbuf *rhash,
00071         struct ccn_charbuf *name)
00072 {
00073     char *hexL;
00074     char *hexR;
00075     struct ccn_charbuf *uri = ccn_charbuf_create();
00076     if (lhash == NULL || lhash->length == 0) {
00077         hexL = strdup("none");
00078     } else
00079         hexL = hex_string(lhash->buf, lhash->length);
00080     if (rhash == NULL || rhash->length == 0) {
00081         hexR = strdup("none");
00082     } else
00083         hexR = hex_string(rhash->buf, rhash->length);
00084     if (name != NULL)
00085         ccn_uri_append(uri, name->buf, name->length, 1);
00086     else
00087         ccn_charbuf_append_string(uri, "(null)");
00088     printf("%s %s %s\n", ccn_charbuf_as_string(uri), hexL, hexR);
00089     fflush(stdout);
00090     free(hexL);
00091     free(hexR);
00092     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&uri);
00093     return(0);
00094 }
00095 
00096 int
00097 main(int argc, char **argv)
00098 {
00099     int opt;
00100     int res;
00101     struct ccn *h;
00102     struct ccns_slice *slice;
00103     struct ccns_handle *ccns;
00104     struct ccns_name_closure nc = {0};
00105     struct ccns_name_closure *closure = &nc;
00106     struct ccn_charbuf *prefix = ccn_charbuf_create();
00107     struct ccn_charbuf *roothash = NULL;
00108     struct ccn_charbuf *topo = ccn_charbuf_create();
00109     struct ccn_charbuf *clause = ccn_charbuf_create();
00110     int timeout = 10*1000;
00111     unsigned i, j, n;
00112  
00113     slice = ccns_slice_create();
00114     ccn_charbuf_reset(prefix);
00115     ccn_charbuf_reset(topo);
00116     while ((opt = getopt(argc, argv, "hf:p:r:t:w:")) != -1) {
00117         switch (opt) {
00118             case 'f':
00119                 ccn_charbuf_reset(clause);
00120                 if (0 > ccn_name_from_uri(clause, optarg)) usage(argv[0]);
00121                 ccns_slice_add_clause(slice, clause);
00122                 break;
00123             case 'p':
00124                 ccn_charbuf_reset(prefix);
00125                 if (0 > ccn_name_from_uri(prefix, optarg)) usage(argv[0]);
00126                 break;
00127             case 'r':
00128                 n = strlen(optarg);
00129                 if (n == 0) {
00130                     roothash = ccn_charbuf_create();
00131                     break;
00132                 }
00133                 if ((n % 2) != 0)
00134                     usage(argv[0]);
00135                 roothash = ccn_charbuf_create_n(n / 2);
00136                 for (i = 0; i < (n / 2); i++) {
00137                     j = (hex_value(optarg[2*i]) << 4) | hex_value(optarg[1+2*i]);
00138                     ccn_charbuf_append_value(roothash, j, 1);
00139                 }
00140                 break;
00141             case 't':
00142                 ccn_charbuf_reset(topo);
00143                 if (0 > ccn_name_from_uri(topo, optarg)) usage(argv[0]);
00144                 break;
00145             case 'w':
00146                 timeout = atoi(optarg);
00147                 if (timeout < -1) usage(argv[0]);
00148                 timeout *= 1000;
00149                 break;
00150             default:
00151             case 'h':
00152                 usage(argv[0]);
00153         }
00154     }
00155 
00156     ccns_slice_set_topo_prefix(slice, topo, prefix);
00157     h = ccn_create();
00158     res = ccn_connect(h, NULL);
00159     closure->callback = &sync_cb;
00160     ccns = ccns_open(h, slice, closure, roothash, NULL);
00161     ccn_run(h, timeout);
00162     ccns_close(&ccns, NULL, NULL);
00163     ccns_slice_destroy(&slice);
00164     ccn_destroy(&h);
00165     exit(res);
00166 }
